name: Mama (Ori Brusilovsky)
description:
You play a bat-like alien creature, lost in a cave, looking for his Mama. The cave is dark and dangerous, and you need to activate your sonar-shriek to scan your environment. But alas! The sonar grabs the attention of dangerous cave dwellers!

Mama was made in 48 hours in Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost and Found

We are working these days on an extended version. Stay tuned!

Controls:
Up - flap wings
Left/Right - move
Space - Sonar

Credits:
Art by Yaron Granot
Scene and level design by Kiril Goldberg
Programming by Ori Brusilovsky
Music by Shaked Lotan
